name: Dwarf Firecracker
description: The Dwarf Firecracker is a robust humanoid with a penchant for explosive combat, wielding a massive hammer and possessing fiery magical abilities.
memorable: Known for its explosive combat style and ability to deal double damage to structures, making it a formidable opponent in siege scenarios.
goals: To engage in close-range combat and create chaos on the battlefield with fiery attacks.
relations: Often seen with other dwarves and fire-themed creatures, could serve alongside those who value siege tactics.
environment: Typically found in rocky terrains or battlefields where sieges occur.
strengths: Enhanced speed when taking fire damage and the ability to deal significant damage to structures.
weaknesses: Lower wisdom and dexterity, making it susceptible to certain magical tactics.
attacks: Performs a multiattack with either a Wrecking Maul, dealing bludgeoning and fire damage, or a Fire Blast that inflicts fire damage at range.
most_powerful_ability: Combustion Wave, creating a fiery shockwave impacting all creatures in a large radius with both fire and thunder damage.
skills: Has a negative perception skill due to low wisdom.
additional_information: Can reroll initiative to change combat position.
Resistant to fire and poison damage.
Increases speed temporarily when taking fire damage.
Effective in siege scenarios due to double damage to objects.
Uses explosive tactics and area damage abilities.
